>
[Psychic Brigandine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1301)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 42</row>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Splint Mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=11)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Transparent crystals as hard as steel take the place of metal plates on this suit of _+2 [greater invisibility](/Equipment.aspx?ID=287) [splint mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=11)_. Also known as a coat of a thousand thoughts in Vudra and Jalmeray, where it was first developed by psychic warriors, it makes your mind an indomitable fortress. You gain resistance 5 to [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) damage.

 Whenever you use the armor to become [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26), you also become psychically invisible. Each time you would be affected by an effect with the mental trait while you are invisible, attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, it doesn't affect you.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
